name: CCG Shoot 'em Up [LDJAM41]
description: My first LUDUM DARE game, made for LD 41 (theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres). It's a quick, fun, arcade game where you control your ship indirectly by playing cards. Each turn takes 5 seconds after which you draw additional cards and can change your orders. The gameplay should go indefinitely allowing you to try and go for the high-scores!
